R

receive() - Method in class byteremote.common.socket.tcp.TCPSocket
Method used to receive a message from the connected socket via TCP
receive() - Method in class byteremote.common.socket.udp.UDPSocket
Method that return a message received on the port specified at the construct time.
Every UDPSocket.receive() corresponds to UDPSocket.send(message).
Request - Class in byteremote.server.handler
Class used to handle a request
Request() - Constructor for class byteremote.server.handler.Request
 
Response - Class in byteremote.server.handler
Class used to keep an response
Response(Object, Class) - Constructor for class byteremote.server.handler.Response
